text.ascii: vaizaMpAyana uvAca
text.ur: vaiśaṁpāyana uvāca

text.ascii: tataH sUryodaye dhaumyaH kRtvAhnikam ariMdama
text.ur: tataḥ sūryodaye dhaumyaḥ kr̥tvāhnikam ariṁdama

text.ascii: ArSTiSeNena sahitaH pANDavAn abhyavartata
text.ur: ārṣṭiṣeṇena sahitaḥ pāṇḍavān abhyavartata

text.ascii: te 'bhivAdyArSTiSeNasya pAdau dhaumyasya caiva ha
text.ur: te ’bhivādyārṣṭiṣeṇasya pādau dhaumyasya caiva ha

text.ascii: tataH prAJjalayaH sarve brAhmaNAMs tAn apUjayan
text.ur: tataḥ prāñjalayaḥ sarve brāhmaṇāṁs tān apūjayan

text.ascii: tato yudhiSThiraM dhaumyo gRhItvA dakSiNe kare
text.ud: ततो युधिष्ठिरं धौम्यो गृहीत्वा दक्षिणे करे
text.ur: tato yudhiṣṭhiraṁ dhaumyo gr̥hītvā dakṣiṇe kare

text.ascii: prAcIM dizam abhiprekSya maharSir idam abravIt
text.ur: prācīṁ diśam abhiprekṣya maharṣir idam abravīt

text.ascii: asau sAgaraparyantAM bhUmim AvRtya tiSThati
text.ur: asau sāgaraparyantāṁ bhūmim āvr̥tya tiṣṭhati

text.ascii: zailarAjo mahArAja mandaro 'bhivirAjate
text.ur: śailarājo mahārāja mandaro ’bhivirājate

text.ascii: indravaizravaNAv etAM dizaM pANDava rakSataH
text.ur: indravaiśravaṇāv etāṁ diśaṁ pāṇḍava rakṣataḥ

text.ascii: parvataiz ca vanAntaiz ca kAnanaiz copazobhitAm
text.ur: parvataiś ca vanāntaiś ca kānanaiś copaśobhitām

text.ascii: etad Ahur mahendrasya rAjJo vaizravaNasya ca
text.ur: etad āhur mahendrasya rājño vaiśravaṇasya ca

text.ascii: RSayaH sarvadharmajJAH sadma tAta manISiNaH
text.ur: r̥ṣayaḥ sarvadharmajñāḥ sadma tāta manīṣiṇaḥ

text.ascii: ataz codyantam Adityam upatiSThanti vai prajAH
text.ur: ataś codyantam ādityam upatiṣṭhanti vai prajāḥ

text.ascii: RSayaz cApi dharmajJAH siddhAH sAdhyAz ca devatAH
text.ur: r̥ṣayaś cāpi dharmajñāḥ siddhāḥ sādhyāś ca devatāḥ

text.ascii: yamas tu rAjA dharmAtmA sarvaprANabhRtAM prabhuH
text.ur: yamas tu rājā dharmātmā sarvaprāṇabhr̥tāṁ prabhuḥ

text.ascii: pretasattvagatIm etAM dakSiNAm Azrito dizam
text.ur: pretasattvagatīm etāṁ dakṣiṇām āśrito diśam

text.ascii: etat saMyamanaM puNyam atIvAdbhutadarzanam
text.ur: etat saṁyamanaṁ puṇyam atīvādbhutadarśanam

text.ascii: pretarAjasya bhavanam RddhyA paramayA yutam
text.ur: pretarājasya bhavanam r̥ddhyā paramayā yutam

text.ascii: yaM prApya savitA rAjan satyena pratitiSThati
text.ur: yaṁ prāpya savitā rājan satyena pratitiṣṭhati

text.ascii: astaM parvatarAjAnam etam Ahur manISiNaH
text.ur: astaṁ parvatarājānam etam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ

text.ascii: etaM parvatarAjAnaM samudraM ca mahodadhim
text.ur: etaṁ parvatarājānaṁ samudraṁ ca mahodadhim

text.ascii: Avasan varuNo rAjA bhUtAni parirakSati
text.ur: āvasan varuṇo rājā bhūtāni parirakṣati

text.ascii: udIcIM dIpayann eSa dizaM tiSThati kIrtimAn
text.ur: udīcīṁ dīpayann eṣa diśaṁ tiṣṭhati kīrtimān

text.ascii: mahAmerur mahAbhAga zivo brahmavidAM gatiH
text.ur: mahāmerur mahābhāga śivo brahmavidāṁ gatiḥ

text.ascii: yasmin brahmasadaz caiva tiSThate ca prajApatiH
text.ur: yasmin brahmasadaś caiva tiṣṭhate ca prajāpatiḥ

text.ascii: bhUtAtmA visRjan sarvaM yat kiM cij jaGgamAgamam
text.ur: bhūtātmā visr̥jan sarvaṁ yat kiṁ cij jaṅgamāgamam

text.ascii: yAn Ahur brahmaNaH putrAn mAnasAn dakSasaptamAn
text.ur: yān āhur brahmaṇaḥ putrān mānasān dakṣasaptamān

text.ascii: teSAm api mahAmeruH sthAnaM zivam anAmayam
text.ur: teṣām api mahāmeruḥ sthānaṁ śivam anāmayam

text.ascii: atraiva pratitiSThanti punar atrodayanti ca
text.ur: atraiva pratitiṣṭhanti punar atrodayanti ca

text.ascii: sapta devarSayas tAta vasiSThapramukhAH sadA
text.ur: sapta devarṣayas tāta vasiṣṭhapramukhāḥ sadā

text.ascii: dezaM virajasaM pazya meroH zikharam uttamam
text.ur: deśaṁ virajasaṁ paśya meroḥ śikharam uttamam

text.ascii: yatrAtmatRptair adhyAste devaiH saha pitAmahaH
text.ur: yatrātmatr̥ptair adhyāste devaiḥ saha pitāmahaḥ

text.ascii: yam AhuH sarvabhUtAnAM prakRteH prakRtiM dhruvam
text.ur: yam āhuḥ sarvabhūtānāṁ prakr̥teḥ prakr̥tiṁ dhruvam

text.ascii: anAdinidhanaM devaM prabhuM nArAyaNaM param
text.ur: anādinidhanaṁ devaṁ prabhuṁ nārāyaṇaṁ param

text.ascii: brahmaNaH sadanAt tasya paraM sthAnaM prakAzate
text.ur: brahmaṇaḥ sadanāt tasya paraṁ sthānaṁ prakāśate

text.ascii: devAz ca yatnAt pazyanti divyaM tejomayaM zivam
text.ur: devāś ca yatnāt paśyanti divyaṁ tejomayaṁ śivam

text.ascii: atyarkAnaladIptaM tat sthAnaM viSNor mahAtmanaH
text.ur: atyarkānaladīptaṁ tat sthānaṁ viṣṇor mahātmanaḥ

text.ascii: svayaiva prabhayA rAjan duSprekSyaM devadAnavaiH
text.ur: svayaiva prabhayā rājan duṣprekṣyaṁ devadānavaiḥ

text.ascii: tad vai jyotIMSi sarvANi prApya bhAsanti no 'pi ca
text.ud: तद्वै ज्योतींषि सर्वाणि प्राप्य भासन्ति नोऽपि च
text.ur: tad vai jyotīṁṣi sarvāṇi prāpya bhāsanti no ’pi ca

text.ascii: svayaM vibhur adInAtmA tatra hy abhivirAjate
text.ur: svayaṁ vibhur adīnātmā tatra hy abhivirājate

text.ascii: yatayas tatra gacchanti bhaktyA nArAyaNaM harim
text.ur: yatayas tatra gacchanti bhaktyā nārāyaṇaṁ harim

text.ascii: pareNa tapasA yuktA bhAvitAH karmabhiH zubhaiH
text.ud: परेण तपसा युक्ता भाविताः कर्मभिः शुभैः
text.ur: pareṇa tapasā yuktā bhāvitāḥ karmabhiḥ śubhaiḥ

text.ascii: yogasiddhA mahAtmAnas tamomohavivarjitAH
text.ur: yogasiddhā mahātmānas tamomohavivarjitāḥ

text.ascii: tatra gatvA punar nemaM lokam AyAnti bhArata
text.ur: tatra gatvā punar nemaṁ lokam āyānti bhārata

text.ascii: sthAnam etan mahAbhAga dhruvam akSayam avyayam
text.ur: sthānam etan mahābhāga dhruvam akṣayam avyayam

text.ascii: Izvarasya sadA hy etat praNamAtra yudhiSThira
text.ur: īśvarasya sadā hy etat praṇamātra yudhiṣṭhira

text.ascii: etaM jyotIMSi sarvANi prakarSan bhagavAn api
text.ur: etaṁ jyotīṁṣi sarvāṇi prakarṣan bhagavān api

text.ascii: kurute vitamaskarmA Adityo 'bhipradakSiNam
text.ur: kurute vitamaskarmā ādityo ’bhipradakṣiṇam

text.ascii: astaM prApya tataH saMdhyAm atikramya divAkaraH
text.ur: astaṁ prāpya tataḥ saṁdhyām atikramya divākaraḥ

text.ascii: udIcIM bhajate kASThAM dizam eSa vibhAvasuH
text.ur: udīcīṁ bhajate kāṣṭhāṁ diśam eṣa vibhāvasuḥ

text.ascii: sa merum anuvRttaH san punar gacchati pANDava
text.ur: sa merum anuvr̥ttaḥ san punar gacchati pāṇḍava

text.ascii: prAGmukhaH savitA devaH sarvabhUtahite rataH
text.ur: prāṅmukhaḥ savitā devaḥ sarvabhūtahite rataḥ

text.ascii: sa mAsaM vibhajan kAlaM bahudhA parvasaMdhiSu
text.ur: sa māsaṁ vibhajan kālaṁ bahudhā parvasaṁdhiṣu

text.ascii: tathaiva bhagavAn somo nakSatraiH saha gacchati
text.ur: tathaiva bhagavān somo nakṣatraiḥ saha gacchati

text.ascii: evam eSa parikramya mahAmerum atandritaH
text.ur: evam eṣa parikramya mahāmerum atandritaḥ

text.ascii: bhAvayan sarvabhUtAni punar gacchati mandaram
text.ur: bhāvayan sarvabhūtāni punar gacchati mandaram

text.ascii: tathA tamisrahA devo mayUkhair bhAvayaJ jagat
text.ur: tathā tamisrahā devo mayūkhair bhāvayañ jagat

text.ascii: mArgam etad asaMbAdham AdityaH parivartate
text.ur: mārgam etad asaṁbādham ādityaḥ parivartate

text.ascii: sisRkSuH zizirANy eSa dakSiNAM bhajate dizam
text.ur: sisr̥kṣuḥ śiśirāṇy eṣa dakṣiṇāṁ bhajate diśam

text.ascii: tataH sarvANi bhUtAni kAlaH ziziram Rcchati
text.ur: tataḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni kālaḥ śiśiram r̥cchati

text.ascii: sthAvarANAM ca bhUtAnAM jaGgamAnAM ca tejasA
text.ud: स्थावराणां च भूतानां जङ्गमानां च तेजसा
text.ur: sthāvarāṇāṁ ca bhūtānāṁ jaṅgamānāṁ ca tejasā

text.ascii: tejAMsi samupAdatte nivRttaH san vibhAvasuH
text.ur: tejāṁsi samupādatte nivr̥ttaḥ san vibhāvasuḥ

text.ascii: tataH svedaH klamas tandrI glAniz ca bhajate narAn
text.ud: ततः स्वेदः क्लमस्तन्द्री ग्लानिश्च भजते नरान्
text.ur: tataḥ svedaḥ klamas tandrī glāniś ca bhajate narān

text.ascii: prANibhiH satataM svapno hy abhIkSNaM ca niSevyate
text.ud: प्राणिभिः सततं स्वप्नो ह्यभीक्ष्णं च निषेव्यते
text.ur: prāṇibhiḥ satataṁ svapno hy abhīkṣṇaṁ ca niṣevyate

text.ascii: evam etad anirdezyaM mArgam AvRtya bhAnumAn
text.ur: evam etad anirdeśyaṁ mārgam āvr̥tya bhānumān

text.ascii: punaH sRjati varSANi bhagavAn bhAvayan prajAH
text.ur: punaḥ sr̥jati varṣāṇi bhagavān bhāvayan prajāḥ

text.ascii: vRSTimArutasaMtApaiH sukhaiH sthAvarajaGgamAn
text.ur: vr̥ṣṭimārutasaṁtāpaiḥ sukhaiḥ sthāvarajaṅgamān

text.ascii: vardhayan sumahAtejAH punaH pratinivartate
text.ur: vardhayan sumahātejāḥ punaḥ pratinivartate

text.ascii: evam eSa caran pArtha kAlacakram atandritaH
text.ur: evam eṣa caran pārtha kālacakram atandritaḥ

text.ascii: prakarSan sarvabhUtAni savitA parivartate
text.ur: prakarṣan sarvabhūtāni savitā parivartate

text.ascii: saMtatA gatir etasya naiSa tiSThati pANDava
text.ur: saṁtatā gatir etasya naiṣa tiṣṭhati pāṇḍava

text.ascii: AdAyaiva tu bhUtAnAM tejo visRjate punaH
text.ud: आदायैव तु भूतानां तेजो विसृजते पुनः
text.ur: ādāyaiva tu bhūtānāṁ tejo visr̥jate punaḥ

text.ascii: vibhajan sarvabhUtAnAm AyuH karma ca bhArata
text.ur: vibhajan sarvabhūtānām āyuḥ karma ca bhārata

text.ascii: ahorAtrAn kalAH kASThAH sRjaty eSa sadA vibhuH
text.ur: ahorātrān kalāḥ kāṣṭhāḥ sr̥jaty eṣa sadā vibhuḥ
